author: Rebecca Falconer
title: "Expect action:" DOJ issues warning on religious service crackdowns amid coronavirus outbreak
description: Department of Justice spokesperson Kerri Kupec signaled in a tweet Saturday upcoming DOJ action against local authorities that have cracked down on religious services as part of restrictions introduced in response to the novel coronavirus outbreak. Why it mat…
content:
